Construction APIs

As we have already seen it previously in our sample application and in the introduction, rendering vector graphics in pixel buffers is first a matter of constructing the correct data structures representing these vectors.

Libart provides a number of API functions to create and manipulate the ArtVpath and ArtBpath data structures which are detailed in the folowing three sections.
